topic: Asking for Directions to a Restaurant

sentences.chinese: 对不起，请问怎么去附近的餐厅？
sentences.pinyin: duì bu qǐ, qǐng wèn zěn me qù fù jìn de cān tīng?
sentences.english: Excuse me, how do I get to a nearby restaurant?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: wǎng qián zǒu, rán hòu zuǒ zhuǎn
sentences.english: Go straight ahead, then turn left
sentences.speaker: B

sentences.pinyin: cān tīng zài yòu biān ma?
sentences.english: Is the restaurant on the right?
sentences.speaker: A

sentences.pinyin: bù shì, zài zuǒ biān, hóng sè zhāo pái
